name: Sokoban Remastered
description:
This is my updated edition of the classic box-pushing puzzle game Sokoban! This is my first time using PuzzleScript, and I really like it!

New features include:

Sticky blocks- blue crates that stick to each other but will separate when put under stress.

Swapping blocks- purple crates that will swap positions with you when you push them.

Mimic blocks- pink crates that move with your player.

Holes- your player cannot pass through these tiles. However, pushing any crate onto one will fill it in and turn it back into a ground tile.

Gates- yellow walls that allow your player to pass over them, but will stop crates from moving through.

Other than that, all of the normal Sokoban rules apply- move your player and push all of the crates onto the goals, and walls stop your movement.

This game has 20 levels. See if you can make it through them all! :)
